title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 691.7 - Attorneys convicted of crimes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 691.7 - Attorneys convicted of crimes

State Regulations

The clerk of any court within the judicial department
in which an attorney admitted to practice in this State is convicted of a crime
shall within five days of said conviction forward a certificate thereof to the
committee having jurisdiction over the matter pursuant to section
691.4
(a) of this

Part and section
1240.12
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
691.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
